comments.creator: jamezmcclain@gmail.com
comments.text:
Yes the update is made to the server using ajax.

And it is on u413.com, the site uses jquery to make the ajax requests and create the text box for the chat. When holding a key down in chat, the focus switches.

The website owner looked into it, and people tested it and saw that this does not happen on opera, webkit-based, or IE. Also this only happens on the linux version of FF four. So it had to be concluded that the browser was handling something wrong. I can give you the JS for the site if needed.
